headline: Rockwell Automation (Kalypso) Recognized as a Representative Vendor in 2024 Gartner速 Market Guide for Life Science Regulatory Information Management Solutions
summary: MILWAUKEE, September 09, 2025--Kalypso, a Rockwell Automation (NYSE: ROK) business, today announced its inclusion as a Representative Vendor in the 2024 Gartner速 Market Guide for Life Science Regulatory Information Management (RIM) Solutions. Kalypso was recognized for its Digital Regulatory Information Management solution tailored for the medical device industry.
